about_the_game:
OVERVIEW

PROJECT CORRUPTION is a tense and atmospheric survival-horror game set in the industrial depths of the failing I.B.I.S. space station where you play as Tanner looking for your wife who is a lead scientist aboard the station.

STORY TELLING

  • Unravel a deep narrative: Discover the dark history of I.B.I.S. and the twisted experiments that led to the station's downfall.

  • Subtle dialogue and clues: Pay close attention to conversations environmental storytelling to uncover hidden truths.

  • Tragedy: Experience a gripping emotional journey as you search for Kaela, whose story intertwines with the station's haunting secrets.

ATMOSPHERIC SCI-FI HORROR

  • Claustrophobic environments: Navigate the industrial halls of the I.B.I.S. space station, designed for function over aesthetics.

  • Hostile lifeforms: Encounter monstrous adaptations born from alien life forms and failed experimentations.

EXPLORATION AND SURVIVAL

  • Diverse station areas: Explore the stations living quarters, labs, comms, water treatment facilities, testing facilities, medical bay and more, each with unique challenges.

  • Navigate the station: As the halls of the I.B.I.S. space station become more and more hazardous you must make use of the stations vent system.

Resource management: Scavenge supplies and equipment to survive the station's many dangers.

HOSTILE AI

  • Guard encounters: Avoid or attempt to fight the patrol guards who hunt down anything that moves.

  • Hostile creatures: Face off against adaptive alien entities with behaviors that keep you on edge.

  • Stealth and strategy: Choose when to hide, fight or run as enemies patrol and react to your presence. 

  • AI conflict: Manipulate the station's inhabitants by pitting guards and creatures against each other-use the chaos as a distraction or weaken both sides to improve your odds of survival.

PERSONAL MESSAGE FROM THE DEV 

Project Corruption is a solo game dev project with a focus on atmosphere, story and gameplay balance. The project is built on the belief that great games stem from a focus on creativity and quality rather then financial prospect. When you focus on crafting something meaningful, the success will follow. 

The goal of Project Corruption is to become one of many countless pieces of evidence that anything is possible. Project Corruption aims to inspire others to pursue their ideas, no matter the scale or challenge (though you should probably scope your projects into something realistically achievable).

Every detail from the haunting environments to the subtle audio cues, reflects a commitment to delivering an unforgettable experience that stands tall within the indie game genre.

content_descriptors.notes:
Project Corruption contains mature themes and graphic content intended for an adult audience. Players can expect the following:

- Violence and gore: Includes scenes of extreme violence, blood, and depictions of mutilation as part of the game's horror elements.

-Horror themes: Features intense sequences with disturbing imagery, hostile creatures, and psychological tension.

-Sensitive topics: The game explores themes of corporate greed, unethical experimentation, human suffering, and animal suffering which may be distressing to some players.

-Drug/alcohol use: Includes references to  substance abuse in the context of character backstories and environmental story telling.

-Self-harm and tragic loss: The narrative contains visual and implied depictions of self-harm and themes surrounding grief, loss, and personal tragedy.

This content is designed to serve the story's tone and atmosphere and may not be suitable for all players. Viewer discretion is advised.

short_description: Project Corruption throws you into the haunting walls of the I.B.I.S. space station as you respond to an S.O.S. signal in search of your wife. Uncover the stations dark secrets, confront monstrous horrors, and survive the aftermath of the failed experiments in immersive sci-fi horror experience.
